newsitem.title: FINLAND: Kemira sees 1997 earnings below 1996 level.
newsitem.headline: Kemira sees 1997 earnings below 1996 level.

text.p: Finnish chemicals group Kemira Oy Oy said on Monday it expected full-year 1997 net income to remain below the 1996 level.

"Net financial expenses are expected to be below those of last year. Net income for the group is expected to be good, though below last year's record level," Kemira said in a statement with its January-April results.
In 1996, Kemira's net financial costs were 397 million markka. The group's net profit was 617 million markka.
In January-April, Kemira's profit before extraordinary items and tax fell 21 percent to 377 million markka.
